metadata.title: CVE-2024-37370 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) before 1.21.3, an attacker can modify theplaintext Extra Count field of a confidential GSS krb5 wrap token, causingthe unwrapped token to appear truncated to the application.

criterions.comment: krb5 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
